channel.title: Help-a-Noob :)
channel.description:
I'm pretty sure this isn't quote by quote the "right section" because there isnt a section for this! Although this does kinda have to do with my server. :P I'm very sorry, MoparScape staff but you should make a technical support board or something...
Topic: Well this just stinks...
Problem: Signature Troubles :S :confused:
I'm lost :| My account is like messed up or something.. My signature is blank if I try to make it an image, only text works. This is what I'm trying to make my signature (I'm adding this directly in the signature section of my Profile) [code][img]http://img292.imageshack.us/img292/7019/userbarpf9.png[/img][/code] It appears on all other forums, even on this forums post! : [img]http://img292.imageshack.us/img292/7019/userbarpf9.png[/img]
Can anyone please! Please! Help me! Im desperate! Sorry for any problems I cause (forums wise) But there is not section for this!
MSN I'M (Im online): [code]xxzunoxx@live.com[/code] Please help me! Thanks for viewing!
